meanings.definition: The quality or state of lasting for all time.
meanings.sent1: The foreverness of the stars in the sky is truly mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The idea of foreverness can be comforting during difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The foreverness of a turtle's life makes them seem like wise creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him had a foreverness that never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The foreverness of the ancient ruins left us in awe of the past.

meanings.definition: The concept of eternity or endless duration.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, foreverness is symbolized by a never-ending circle.
meanings.sent2: The foreverness of the ocean seemed to stretch beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The foreverness of a child's curiosity can lead to many questions.
meanings.sent4: The foreverness of time is a concept that is hard for our minds to grasp.
meanings.sent5: The foreverness of the mountains reminded him of his own smallness in the world.
